TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PresenterSlideMode extends DocumentFormat.OpenXml.Presentation.EmptyType

Docs.summary: Presenter Slide Show Mode. When the object is serialized out as xml, its qualified name is p:present.

remarks.format:
## Remarks [!INCLUDE[openxmlnoticeiso](~/includes/openxmlnoticeiso.md)]
**present (Presenter Slide Show Mode)**
This element specifies that the presentation slide show should be viewed in a full-screen presenter mode. In this mode, the presentation is displayed on one monitor while a different monitor displays notes and provides navigation controls intended to be viewed only by the presenter.
[*Example*: Consider the following presentation that is set to be viewed in a present mode.
```xml <p:presentationPr xmlns:a="" xmlns:r="" xmlns:p=""> <p:showPr> … <p:present/> … </p:showPr> </p:presentationPr> ```
*end example*]
|Parent Elements| |---------------------| |showPr (§19.2.1.30)|
[*Note*: The W3C XML Schema definition of this element’s content model (CT_Empty) is located in §A.3. *end note*]
[!INCLUDE[openxmlnoticeiso](~/includes/openxmlcopyrightiso.md)]
